QuestData.Title: A Charming Deception
QuestData.Description: Reshad is more than he appears; a mottled old crow with his beak in a book, certainly, but we need him.$B$BShadows gather beneath the lonely spire, in Veil Terokk. Reshad must make it there safely.$B$BAlong the path you'll find charms primed with illusion spells. You need only touch them to take on Reshad's image.$B$BAdherent assassins are on the prowl for an old outcast with scrolls on his back. They will fall upon you.$B$BOh, but won't they be surprised when the illusion fades?! Kee-hee-hee!
QuestData.LogDescription: Use $1oa Illusion Charms to draw out Adherent Harriers.
QuestData.RewardText: How very noble of you to act as bait on my behalf. I will not forget this.
